Name: Andrew D
Title: Quirky!
Review: At first, I thought this would be a subpar museum but it gets interesting very fast. There are many wacky vehicles such as stilletto cars, toilet cars, sofa cars! I would say spend about 45-60 minutes there.

Name: Jayavel D
Title: Nice Place
Review: Had visited the Car museum in Hyderabad. Very great place and the work done by Owner with the world record.

Name: Kiran
Title: Very bad
Review: It is very bad experience with the supervisors. They are very rude even on kids. They dont even wear the masks.Not allowing even to touch.. the way convey rule  is very very bad. Wash rooms very durty.This is private museum. The founder may be started with positive side. But the waste people are monitoring and they degrading the value of it. Entry ticket cost also high.

Name: nms01
Title: FUN FUN FUN!
Review: Omg! So much fun visiting a car museum which has cars in every possible shape and size and object! There are cars in the shape of a bed, a ladies handbag, a bat, a lipstick and even a CoronaVirus. There are so many clicking opportunities with interactive displays too! Loved it.. for a fun day out in the city!

Name: Kaushik G
Title: Amazing experience
Review: We had visited Sudha Cars Museum which is located close to the Zoo during our sightseeing in Hyderabad. Entrance tickets are priced at 50 rupees per person and another 50 rupees for taking pictures using mobile phone or camera. The place has a large collection of unique cars in variety of shapes and sizes. We saw cars shaped like large football, pencil, cricket bat, cake, Shiva lingam, insects and what not. We had not visited any such Museum before and it was an amazing experience.

Name: Ankur R
Title: Not worth it!
Review: The concept of a car museum is good but here they simply added wheels to any random shape. No mind applied if it is worth it or not. if you are a car enthusiast, definitely it's not the right place, but kids may enjoy it.

Name: Rahul S
Title: Very nice  old cars
Review: Very well maintained  & too much old  cars  in different  different  ways. So much attractive  for who  interested  in cars.

Name: Mittal28
Title: Awesome
Review: Please do visit once..its very nice..waste out of best they make from car and bike..very nice..fish spa is also there..

Name: Aravind D
Title: Nice place less maintenance
Review: The museum was great 2 years back, but now they are not being maintained. It is all with dirt and should have been cleaned.

Name: anandshivraj
Title: Amazing and innovative place!
Review: Amazing and outstanding place to see unique collection of hand made cars along with bikes and scooters models too. This place is covered with very eye catching colorful cars consisting of Cake Car, Shoe Car, Bag car, Bed Car, Insect car, Lotus car, Snooker car, eraser car etc. All these cars are operational and they are designed and built within short period of time. Kids will like this place very much and the one more advantage of this place is it is very near to Zoo park so if you happen to plan this place you can plan both this place as well as Zoo Park too. There are few bikes, scooters which are big in size and one can climb them and take some cool snaps. Ticket prices are also very nominal for Adults Rs. 60/- per head and kids above 3 years are charged too. Mobile and Camera ticket is must and they are charged at Rs. 60/-

Name: Bela
Title: Art in machines
Review: Must visit Reaching d place is a bit cumbersome Hats off to his imagination All working models Parking available Washrooms available

Name: Nikhil Shah
Title: CREATIVITY AT ITS PEAK!
Review: No other place will you get to see this! Something very different. The owner himself is also present here many times. Must go with small children.

Name: Nirmala Gokhale
Title: Nice innovations
Review: We dropped in at a wrong time.  It was raining and the water had logged inside the museum just outside the last shed.  The creations were really amazing.  This museum had featured in OMG-Yeh Mera India which attracted me to see the creations while staying in Hyderabad.  It was very unique experience.

Name: NIL_MODI
Title: Modifications at its best
Review: This udha Cars Museum has a collection of modified cars. Cars are beautifully modified and kept there for viewing. Nice place.

Name: Bulbul
Title: One of its kind
Review: Surprisingly, this museum is not a part of most of the itineraries for Hyderabad. The museum is one of its kind and displays cars designed in various shapes. Mr. K. Sudhakar, a  Guinness world record holder for designing the largest tricycle, has designed all these cars.' Ripley's Believe It or Not!' has also featured the museum on their show. I was amazed to look at the level of imagination that genius has.Unfortunately, the maintenance of the museum is poor.These cars are just not mere designs. All these innovative designed cars are operational and are often brought out of the museum for roadshows where people can see them being driven.

Name: amitthecreator
Title: Sudha Cars Museum
Review: Sudha Cars Museum is an interesting and unique place to visit; the first of its kind, not only in India but also in the world, it is a handmade car museum. This unique museum in Hyderabad has its theme around vintage cars and creative vehicles.

Name: Ravindra V
Title: One of its kind
Review: Has great collection of customized cars, bikes and cycles. It also has very old cars and bikes from world war time as well. This kind of museum is one of its kind in India. Some maintenance is required. Kids will like it. There are some cars placed near entrance which kids can try. Entry ticket is 50 INR per head and 50 INR for camera.

Name: Daniel T
Title: Worth a visit
Review: If you love creativity, then this place is worth a visit. You'll be surprised with the wide range of art at display. Kids will find it more amusing, than adults.You'll find larger than life replicas of objects we come across in daily life.Overall its a nice experience.

Name: ShvRm_Traveller
Title: Unique and interesting
Review: Sudha Car Museum is probably one of its kind museum in India. It is a Car museum per say, but the visitors find very few displays which can be classified as Cars in a classical sort of way. The Museum houses all sorts of model which are powered by engines transforming them into Automobiles.The Museum appears very interesting initially, however, when the visitor sees the same concept being used for most of the displays, the interest recedes. There are not many genuine vehicles from yester years on display.The place had many foot falls during out visit. visitors have buy entry tickets, but the amenities for the visitors such as, washrooms were very dirty.Overall, the place is unique and may be visited once.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: crazy
Review: This museum has a unique crazy set of cars on display made by one passionate guy it seems and he has lot of creativity to create those

Name: GoWrong
Title: Whacky Weird Wonderful
Review: This guy must be one crazy inventor to have built all those amazing models. You can find cars which looking like shoes to dinosaurs. There is a big cycle here which is size to two storied building, and then there is one bike which must be barely 10 cm in heights. Absolutely crazy place

Name: mnrkrishnan
Title: Recognised by Guness book of record
Review: Sudha Cars Museum is an automobile museum located in Hyderabad, India. The museum displays "crazy cars" that resemble everyday objects like pen, Shoe, Billiard Table, FootBall, Burger and also Big type M/Cycles, Double decor Buses for movie shooting. These cars are designed and made by Kanyaboyina Sudhakar (known mainly as K. Sudhakar or K. Sudhakar Yadav) who started it as his hobby in his school days and opened the dedicated museum in 2010.  This museum is worth to see when you are in Hyderabad.  K.Sudhakar is a Guness World Record Holder. He has also been recognized by Repleys Believe it or Not.

Name: Mukta2016
Title: Sudha Cars Museum
Review: Sudha Cars museum is a interesting kind of museum where one man has turned his passion for different types of cars into a visual treat for the visitors. Our kids really enjoyed this place with different models of vintage cars were on display.

Name: Poonam S
Title: Great innovative museum of cars
Review: Very clever man who has invented these cute cars. Excellent innovation. Must visit area, in fact much better than the traditional historic places !

Name: Mandira P
Title: One of its' kind
Review: Really need to appreciate the efforts and the innovation of this guy, enjoyable for all age groups, small food stall also available, in case visiting wth kids.

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Vintage cars
Review: I always saw the vintage cars in the movies and this was the time when i had the first hand experience to feel these vintage cars so closely.

Name: Chetu1087
Title: Something differently amazing
Review: Quite a different experience with this attraction and something weird also. So much different theme based car seen which you can't even think of. Good place to visit.

Name: Devaa
Title: A one of a kind museum!!!
Review: A must visit for automobile lovers. The hand made modified 4 wheeler and 2 wheeler is a delight to watch. So beautifully crafted by hand and displayed. Its a one person effort and should not be missed.

Name: SRC4297
Title: Unique Museum
Review: A very unique display of modified cars and bikes. Very interesting. Shows how much heart Mr. Sudha has put into his work.

Name: Prashanth Narva
Title: Amazing automobile museum
Review: Been here with kids, it's an amazing experience for the kids, my son loved it... The  cars on display  are handmade

Name: samita p
Title: Sudhacars Museum
Review: If you don't visit it you miss it.The creativity in using spare parts of old automobiles in creating magnificent, unique cars is worth taking note of. The creator and his creation goes beyond your imagination. The models of ladoo car,cricket bat car,double bed car,....ganpati caretc.etc is what you can see here. And amazing thing is most of them are moving cars. In a recent visit with my school kids we were all thrilled to see so many variables. We were doubly privileged to have met the creator himself there.His unique office is something we loved the most. It's a Zara hatke...museum  experience. Must take your kids especially boys.

Name: mahavir
Title: Best wacky car museum
Review: It is really best whacky car museum. O was thrilled to see so many wacky cars like hemet car, camera car, and etc. It would be helpful id there is a slope like something so that physically challenged person can also really enjoy.

Name: Saket K
Title: worth watching. one of its kind
Review: worth watching. one of its kind. few models are really amazing. overall worth spending some time. recommended to plan visit along with Nehru zoological park as it is very nearby

Name: Twinkie09
Title: Fun car museum.
Review: This was a fun quick museum to see.  Great creativity to see all the different cars Sudha has created.  Can't believe they are all functional.  Fun place for big and young kids.

Name: Farheen
Title: UNIQUE &GUINESS WORD RECORD- CAR MUSEUM
Review: Full of entertainment..joy..technical & mechanical knowledge....students must visit for such an ideal place...i had visited with my friends and from entry to exit i used to do my mouth open  ..as WOWWWWW..

Name: Arun V
Title: Good car collection
Review: Hats-off to sudha & company for maintenance of this much car collections.It is worthless for car lovers.only need maximum 30 minutes to cover.

Name: Abhilash K
Title: Great monuments
Review: We can found very old cars here and even I loved the place which is very good to visit with my friends...I love cars

Name: Rajesh_in
Title: Interesting collection of Modified cars
Review: I happened to visit Sudha Cars Museum during my visit to Hyderabad this time and was pleasantly surprised to see this car museum. There are 154 modified cars ,in different shapes and as indicated by the museum they are all in working condition. Very interesting to see the passion and creativity in creating such innovative designs.

Name: Meghaa R
Title: Amazing and interesting
Review: This car museum is really very amazing and interesting, it's fun to see all different types of cars with its different sizes and shapes, should really visit this place once and enjoy

Name: DrAtri
Title: Wow
Review: A wonderful place. This place deserves to be a wonder of the world. Exciting to think how can one man achieve such a collection of marvels for enjoyment of all. Strongly recommend to everyone

Name: PsinghIndia09
Title: The beauty of Sudha cars-Hyderabad
Review: A must explore place and museum here. Sudha cars is internationally acclaimed. Must visit for children. variety of car modifications, designers.

Name: swapnali v
Title: Crazy cars
Review: Thought of creating cars of different shape is very unique. Innovative, crazy cars. Loved it. You can see car of shapes-helmet, sofa, lipstick, compact, kite, computer, shivling, balls. You have many vintage cars and world war II vehicles there.

Name: Anand M
Title: Just Brilliant
Review: This is a must visit - The creativity is just tooo good .Each & every car/vehicle has a theme & also very nicely done.Kids & Adults will have a nice time .... Fish Spa also inside ... relaxing experience .

Name: Sumitkumar_13
Title: Interesting
Review: Sudha Cars Museum provides rare opportunity to see imaginative cars. All type of car shapes are available here for clicking photos.

Name: 702jiteshk
Title: different types of cars
Review: there are various type of cars . there is the entry for it. here you will find different types of car . its in a genius book of world records for different types of unbelievable cars.

Name: Sumeet I
Title: Appreciate creativity
Review: The way the cars are made is awesome.Most appreciable is the art of converting any shape into car or vehicle.Though it's small one and you can watch the whole museum in less than  30 minutes the creativity in making different wacky cars is awesome.

Name: cbk2911
Title: Awesome Museum
Review: In case you are a car lover, you must visit this museum to see all possible more than 150 options available such as sofa, cup and soccer, pen, book, bat etc in which care are made. The tricycle & jeep kept outside are the picture perfect spots.

Name: KVS17
Title: must visit for car lovers
Review: this is something different from i have seen, the cars are made in different shapes or of all the things which we cannot imagine can become into a car. its a must visit place

Name: Kirantp
Title: Will be interesting for  Creative people
Review: Parking is free.Ticket charge was approx 50 INR.Need to take separate ticket for Taking pics.The founder's hobby turned to a museum is an opportunity for people to experience the various levels people can do for their passion.Amazing creativity and efforts  in building motorable items from book,pen,balls,shoes and what not.Also a small collection of Vintage cars.The Display is inside a Warehouse and is hot inside,not air-conditioned.So won't suggest during Summer time or noon time.Can complete the tour in 1 hour.

Name: kkaushik2015
Title: good for kids
Review: must visit place .....ripley BION....GWR....place...take kids with you and even for adults and elderly people this place is good....washroom available.....they charge separately for photo camera ( even cell cam)

Name: LadyRider
Title: Creative cars by a single man! Inspiring!
Review: This is so inspiring to see a man who devoted his life to his passion! So many unique vehicles in 1 place created by 1 man - the most inspiring museum in my life so far! Probably you need to be an open minded vehicle lover to enjoy the place, though if you are - you will be in love with this museum. I admire Mr. Sudha, and I wish more and more people in the world can have opportunity to follow own passion in life and create that cool and crazy stuff, breaking the limits and motivating others!Thanks Mr. Sudha! :)

Name: Hemaushu K
Title: Wonderful
Review: This museum have awesome cars and bikes.there are old buses and auto rickrows which are gone by time.there are cars made in shape of cups,camera and toilet etc.

Name: Vivek G
Title: Superb and unique Museum
Review: Really felt proud to have such a museum of over 500 working cars in different peculiar shapes in India. The idea is really awesome. They have all sorts of day to day things like lipstick, Purse, Shoe etc etc in the form of a working car. The have some old original vehicles used in WWII as well as luxurious cars like Rolce Royce. Honoured to meet the Curator Mr Sudhakar there. He is a very humble man. A MUST VISIT

Name: sudeshrele
Title: Best Car Museum Ever seen
Review: We were awestruck after visiting this museum wherein the visiting charges are very economical to see wonderful cars made in saucer & cup, pen, sofa set. There are more than 100 models worth seeing. Triple cycle is such a huge one & amusement for all of us.

Name: clausen d
Title: Car museum
Review: Be prepared to be fascinated by the car creations. Not a normal car museum like we would generally associate, but houses creations of different kinds of cars such as cup-car, christmas tree car, bed-car, etc which are all workable. Go just for seeing the creativity and inventiveness.

Name: Parag S
Title: Good place to visit to see cars of different shapes
Review: Nice place to visit if you are fond of watching cars of different shapes. The place also has some old collection of vehicles. Children enjoy watching cars of various shapes like cake, bat, etc.

Name: kartik1402
Title: unique & incredible
Review: one man's hobby, imagination &skill has manifested into sudha car museum. its quite an interesting place, where you'll get to see a vehicle made in form of daily object. there are some vintage cars too. it should take half an hour to 45 minutes to go around the place and see the exhibits. this place is very close to nehru zoo, one can combine visits to both the places.

Name: RamMeher
Title: Sheer waste of time
Review: I visited Sudha Car museum on Jan 15 2018 reading the reviews on trip advisor . I was hoping to spend 2 to 3 hours there and packed lunch . The ticket price was 50 Rs and they charged even for my 4 year old daughter full ticket price . You will finish the entire car museum in 30 minutes . The space is not big to have lunch there . The employees are trying to sell their CD priced at 100 Rs . Unfortunately it was Monday and the Zoo was closed . Overall don't visit it unless you are a car enthusiast.

Name: ghanshyamb2017
Title: Good place to visit
Review: Visited this place last month. And many diiFerent types of vehicles. Never seen such type in india. Best place to visit if u area a vehicle lover. The biggest tricycle in the world is the best one to see which has won the guiness world record. It is huge. Such a museum is one of its kind.

Name: Dipesh B
Title: Best hand made car museum. Kids enjoy
Review: This museum has numerous cars that are hand made, in different shapes, sizes and engines. All are working models. They have a good collection of World War II vehicles. It is an interesting place to appriciate the creativity. Kids enjoy the place.

Name: Rayomand P
Title: Amazing...Must Visit
Review: This place is a real gem hidden though a bit far from the city centre. It is highly recommended as you would not be disappointed. It is not over crowded like the other over hyped tourist attractions in the old city. The staff is friendly and polite. Would love to visit again whenever I am in Hyderabad and also recommend it to friends if they are visiting Hyderabad.

Name: MaheshKhopkar
Title: Sudha Car Museum
Review: The ultimate museum of its kind. Everyone can enjoy various types of car models from different decades. Museum having bike collection from early 19th century. Cars of different shape and sizes are very nice.

Name: TrravvelIndia
Title: Not a Museum.... But a has a Different car collections
Review: Let me tell you it is not a museum with vintage cars. There are few vintage car models.But majorly this has car museum has cars with different models like computer, bat, eraser, sharpener, ball etc. All cars are working conditions.Visit only if you have spare time can also be skipped.

Name: KMMAHAVADI
Title: intrested person
Review: one should have time, interest, money, courage to run such place. nice collections and creations here.

Name: clfurn
Title: As a lover of cars, this isn't really a car museum
Review: I was a little disappointed.  Basically he fabricates a fairly detailed object and puts a small gas powered engine in it with a steering wheel. I view it as more campy than real car museum.  I was a good activity to kill 2 1/2 hours.

Name: Bimal0401
Title: Some thing different to have it.
Review: The Sudha Cars Museum is place with wonder where one will find cars in different models, shapes etc. The neat and clean Museum is must visit to witness the mind blowing creation in automobile field. The Museum is must visit by all the age group especially small children.

Name: hemang m
Title: A treat for Car Lovers
Review: This place is a real treat for all the car lovers. From outside it seems to be a small cramped place, but once you go in & backside, boy o boy, you'll take back your words.So many different types of cars, its just unthinkable about how someone can be so creative to make so many types of cars.Double decker car, vintage car, cars in the shape of a football, lord shiva car, shoe car, cake car, cricket ball car, PC Car, Laddoo car, Camera Car, Burger Car, Cup & Saucer car etc etc, the list is endless.Awesome is an under statement for this place.Take your time to visit this place, as its simply mind-blowing. PS: Just like other places in Hyd, even here there are camera charges.In a nutshell:Can it be recommended - Hell Yes !Child & Adult Friendly - CertainlyWorth a 2nd visit - AbsolutelyAccessible from the city - YesStaff - Friendly, co-operative.Entry Fee - Affordable & mainly, worth the price paid

Name: Footprints727663
Title: Big Museum
Review: I went to Sudha Cars Museum. Sudha Cars Museum is located at Bahadurpura about 6 km from center of Hyderabad. It was established by Mr. Sudhakar, who was interested in motors from his schooling. This museum is first and only handmade Wacky Car museum in the World and has also achieved Guinness World Record for making the Largest Tricycle in the World. It is great place to go.

Name: lovetravelonly
Title: Car Museum
Review: A typical museum for car and a big treat for car lovers. Many cars which are in running condition. A variety of shapes and sizes of cars seen. There are some huge car models at the entrance. A big wow slips off our mouth when we enter.

Name: bujji16
Title: must see in hyderabad
Review: had heard about this . so made sure we visited.we had the pleasure of meeting Mr. sudhakar . he explained in length about his achievements

Name: menonCGN
Title: A misnomer!
Review: I went there expecting to see vintage cars and vehicles of historical significance; but what the 'museum' had was crudely built replicas and some vehicles like a 1950 model Fiat! It is not a museum at all. I felt it as just a junk yard. Hence the choice of title for this review. My advice to the enthusiasts of automobiles or vintage vehicles; please do not waste your time and money by visiting this place while you are in Hyderabad.

Name: Santanu D
Title: Definitely Visit. Its Awesome :)
Review: I planned to visit this place and thought that few vintage cars will be there, but what I see was great. There are a lot of cars in working condition of different shapes and sizes totally unexpected. We spent around 3 hr to see all cars . there are 3 big halls accommodating more than 300 cars. All are working and maintained well. The entry ticket is 50 and for camera another 50INR . So Its a must visit place. Thanks

Name: avenkat2016
Title: lots of different shaped "cars"
Review: tourist spot. visit only if you have young kids who like cars. funny to see attenders trying to upsell and hawk dvds at this location. basically a museum made up of one mans hobby.

Name: Nikhil Vashisht
Title: Wow is the word for Mr. Sudha-Car !
Review: Amazingly awesome place, with a loads of unique/crazy cars. The designs varies from Brinjal, Handbag, Sofa, Bed, Lipstick, Helmet, Cup-Saucer etc. All cars are drive-able and the best part is the huge car installed at the gate. Enjoyed it to the fullest

Name: Thakkarmeister
Title: Fun place for the kids
Review: Our 4 year old enjoyed a lot. Lots of cars which are supposedly in running condition and come in a variety of shapes and sizes. Think in terms of Coputer shaped car, tennis ballo shaped car, Cup and Saucer shaped car...etc. There are some huge car models at the entrance that the children can climb into and play and take pictures. There is a small canteen on site serving water, soft drinks and chips. Worth the Rs 50 entry. We enjoyed just looking at the excitement of our son.

Name: sharmasanjeev2017
Title: Good place for kids who love cars or automobiles
Review: Really nice display of working models of all sorts of cars.. that one can imagine. our kid just loved it.We reached little late beyond 6 when they close but they were kind enough to accommodate for kid sake.

Name: Suresh B
Title: Not too great
Review: It's a private collection of cars in different shapes and sizes such as cricket bat, burger etc. All the cars are working models but you cannot drive them of course. They are shown working in a car event which is conducted once in two years. Nothing much to see unless you are a car enthusiast but it is close to zoo hence both the visits can be clubbed. It will take you about 30-45 minutes to see the museum. It is open from 9.30 AM to 6.30 PM and the ticket is priced at Rs. 50 for everyone over 3 years. if you want to click pictures then that costs extra.

Name: Chandrasekar R
Title: Skills of an Individual
Review: As a part of One-day city tour organized by Royal Travels, visited this Cars Museum. Car lovers may like this place very much but for others, it does not look very great!

Name: Pramod N
Title: Innovative Car Designs
Review: It great for children to watch innovative car designs made of many things. and hats off to the makers as well. only they should reduce the fees.

Name: Jimmy B
Title: unexpected museum, worth a visit
Review: In Hyderabad, tourists may feel there is not much to do,  and this museum doens't come first in the suggestions.It's a mistake because it is very interesting to see how genious is the owner to build such strange "cars".Suitable for children:

Name: BhautikVVaidya
Title: A very unique palace having beautiful art made with cars
Review: If you like automobiles you should see Sudha Cars Museum at Hyderabad. It has unique ways of exhibiting cars made in shapes of pencils, pens, erasers, cups and other funny objects and, believe it or not, they all work! They are shown working in a car event. But you cannot take pictures because taking cameras is charged extra (more than the ticket of a person), which is not worth. There is even the biggest tricycle in the world (noted in the Guinness book of world records). There is also a huge car that is over two stories tall! It only takes about one hour to complete.

Name: debashreen2018
Title: Nice experience
Review: We went to Hyderabad for medical check up. Got one day free and so went for local sightseeing. Sudha cars muesum is a unique place. Never seen such kind of cars. Good place to roam around and click some pictures of unique car designs like shoe car ,cake car, pencil car and laddu car with Ganesha.

Name: Jamila N
Title: Super car museum
Review: This is a must visit for kids and adults both. It comes on the way to the zoo. It has a collection of all different types of cars and that to in working condition.

Name: Martin Short
Title: Good for car fans
Review: It seems most of the cars in this museum if you can call it that were made by the owner and not originals, but saying that was an enjoyable few minutes as it isnt a large place. Cant say it is a must place to go but okay.

Name: James K
Title: Excellent Attraction
Review: Most enjoyable visit to Hyderabad's best Car Museum and saw some really beautiful old and vintage Cars.  We met the owner of this museum at an event and were glad to take him up on his recommendation to visit the facility.  We were welcomed with great Indian hospitality.  Thank you so much.

Name: Lalbahadur
Title: unique place
Review: One of its kind and unique. Lots of Modified cars and running condition vehicle of different shapes like pen, bat, cup, flower, bed, house, football, cricket ball, cake etc etc. There are many interesting cars to see which i didnt found anywhere. Nice collection. A must visit of hyderabad.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Man made new Machine Mesuem
Review: Best place to see some hand crafted Cars with in the city limits. Good to visit along with Kids as they love them. Most of the vehicles are working.

Name: Rahul B
Title: amazing
Review: the collection of cars were amazing. most of them also work. kids will love it . could not see the biggest car from inside as there was some repair work going on

Name: Hiral Amodia
Title: This is one place that fascinated us the most among all the places that we visited at Hyderabad.
Review: Charminar, Golkonda, Hussain Sagar, Ramoji, Biryani, Haleem, Samosa, Irani Chaai, Osmania Biscits, Karachi Bakey, Shopping… Like any other traveler, these were on our list of activities to be done at Hyderabad. But we were so fortunate that a friend suggested us to visit Sudhar Cars Museum and we obeyed him.This is one place that fascinated us the most among all the places that we visited at Hyderabad.About:Sudha Cars Museum is the first and only handmade Wacky Car Museum in the World. It is the brainchild of Mr. K. Sudhakar, a Guinness World Record Holder for making the Largest Tricycle in theWorld. Sudha Cars Museum location is highly accessible and is located very near to The Char Minar. Majority of the people there know the location and Google Maps is also accurate with its location.Sudha Cars Museum is the first and only handmade Wacky Car Museum in the World. It is the brainchild of Mr. K. Sudhakar, a Guinness World Record Holder for making the Largest Tricycle in theWorld. Sudha Cars Museum location is highly accessible and is located very near to The Char Minar. Majority of the people there know the location and Google Maps is also accurate with its location.Said this, it is not just another Car Museum displaying cars of different types and makes or vintage and sports cars.Your imagination will blow out by knowing that this is a huge museum that contains vehicle attractions in below categories:a). Whacky Cars/Vehicles: Handmade vehicles in shape of Burger, Pencil, Computer, Double Bed, Cricket Bat, Lipstick, Sofa Set, Toilet Seat … and what not. Leave yourself astonished at the sight of these creations of Mr K. Sudhakar which he has made by himself in his workshop. And the best part is that all these cars are in working condition. b). Vintage & Restored Cars/Vehicles: You will be able to see some exciting Vintage and Restored cars like – Fiat, Rolls Royce, Hindustan Motors, Moris etc. This will give a glimpse into the interesting cars of the past. c). Bikes and Cycles:Mr K Sudhakar holds are Guiness Records for making the Largets Tricycle in the World. Here you will be able to see cycles and tricycles in different shapes. Also you will see some adrenaline pumping bike modifications.d). Other: You will also be able to see some exciting stuffs like – Double Decker bus, toy train and toy cars, Modified electric cars, Bike-Cars and much more.All this exciting fun is at a humble 50 Rs entree fees for adults.I am intentionally keeping a small write-up for this post, as the pics will do a better justice.More about Sudha Cars Museum images & on their website.

Name: Arushi K
Title: One time watch, nothing much
Review: There is various design of car but it does not seems that interesting. Kids might find it little interesting but not for adult. Waste of money.

Name: Ambati K
Title: Super
Review: In this musem we can see a lot a cars from first cars there are a huge cars like vintage,benz......etc

Name: Rajesh358
Title: It is worthless to visit as cars are too much far and no space to take pic.
Review: Price is high compare to other museum. All executives are unprofessional.You can't even touch the car and you can watch far from 10 feet ,even don't have much space to take good photographs. dust is all around and no proper cooling and space.  Even you can see in better way on internet pic. I will say that is full of wastage of time and money and effort. You will came to know ,after watching it personally.

Name: Sudha G
Title: Best for Kinds
Review: There are almost every model of vehicles viz vintage cars, every type of vehicles in the miniature of fruits, vegetables etc.  They are providing CD and books for the visitors @Rs.100 & 150 each.

Name: PrabalDas
Title: Sooooo Many Cars.....
Review: A must see for the tourists especially children. There are lots of cars in different shapes & sizes like, cricket bat, tea cup, bed, pen and many more. Don't miss it.

Name: Bhrt
Title: Amazing Place!
Review: An amazing display of the master creation of the world record holders master creation in the making of any i mean any kind of vehicle. He has made vehicle in the shape of ball,bat, condom,house etc..,. He has also made a three floor high tricycle and also there is this funky sitting bench made up of shock absorbers in this museum for public seating. A must visit if your visiting hyderabad on a tour.

Name: VipinSaini
Title: Very Unique and Amazing Place to Visit if You Love Cars
Review: Sudha Cars Museum is Nice Place to visit and Know the Creativity Level with The cars. Very Unique Concept. Amazing. Must Visit Once.

Name: san_vai
Title: passion rulled here
Review: good inspiration for someone who wants to do something different, how passion can mould  your life. worth giving some time. mostly Automotive modification.

Name: Ashish Sabnis
Title: One of its kind
Review: Sudha cars museum is totally unique. I haven't heard of such a museum at least in India. U can feel the passion of Mr.Sudhakar as you go around in the museum. Leisure viewing will take an hour. It's very close to the zoo and approx 2km from Chowmahalla palace. Kids, adults all will enjoy this museum visit.

Name: PK Das
Title: Unique Museum
Review: Innovation is the word comes in mind after visiting this place. The innovator of this museum has turned everything he likes into a car that too tested & certified. Thats why imagination & Innovation has no limit if have that guts too do it.Great place to visit without fail.

Name: jessicas1301
Title: Hidden jem of Hyderabad!
Review: This place is certainly a hidden jem of Hyderabad! The customized cars are beautiful! Each is unique and well crafted. They are real cars, working condition, made in several shapes and sizes - cricket bat, ball, computer, sandal, lipstick, purse, etc. A place not to miss, especially if you have children and teens.
